title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: This chart shows the Average Time Social of Media Daily by Age Group .
\\n You can see that the Average Time Social are in the 35 - 44 and 25 - 34 Age groups .
The most Time Social are in the 45 - 54 Age Group and they use Media Daily twice as much the Average Time Social .
gold: 45 - 54 year old spent the most time on social media on a daily basis , at 148 minutes . On average , 15 - 24 year old spent 124 minutes daily on social media . On average 55 - 64 year old spent 108 minutes on social media .
